mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupbuyingregions (gbNo, parcelAddress, gbDetailAddress, place) VALUES(#{gbNo}, #{parcelAddress}, #{gbDetailAddress}, #{place});
mapper.select: SELECT gb.gbNo, gb.gbContent,gb.recruitPeople, gb.title, gb.finishDate, gb.startDate, gb.joinPrice, gb.gbState, loc.place, loc.gbDetailAddress, c.categoryType, gb.userId, (SELECT nickname FROM user u WHERE u.userid = gb.userId )nickname, (SELECT count(userId) FROM groupBuyingJoining WHERE groupBuyingJoining.gbNo = gb.gbNo) joinPeople, (SELECT count(reviewNo) FROM userreview u2 WHERE u2.userId = 'gb.userId' and u2.reviewNo = 1 ) tradeAgain, (SELECT COUNT(reviewNo) FROM userreview u2 WHERE u2.userId = 'gb.userId' and u2.reviewNo = 2 ) justOkay, (SELECT count(reviewNo) FROM userreview u2 WHERE u2.userId = 'gb.userId' and u2.reviewNo = 3 ) notInterested, (SELECT count(g.userId) FROM groupBuyingJoining g WHERE g.userId = #{param2} and g.gbNo =#{param1} ) isJoining FROM groupBuyingPost gb LEFT OUTER JOIN groupbuyingregions loc on gb.gbNo = loc.gbNo LEFT OUTER JOIN category c on gb.categoryNo=c.categoryNo WHERE gb.gbNo = #{param1};

SELECT recruitPeople, userId , (SELECT count(userId) FROM groupbuyingjoining g2 WHERE g2.gbNo =#{param1})joinPeople, (SELECT count(userId) FROM groupbuyingjoining g2 WHERE g2.gbNo =#{param1} AND g2.userId = #{param2}) isgbJoining FROM groupbuyingpost WHERE gbNo = #{param1};
mapper.insert: insert into groupbuyingjoining (gbNo, userId, joinDate, joinState) values (#{param1}, #{param2}, curDate(),'N');
insert into pointhistory (gbNo, userId, pointMonney, pointReason, pointDate) values (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, curdate());
mapper.select: SELECT g.gbNo, DATE_ADD(g.finishDate , INTERVAL 1 DAY)finishDate, DATE_ADD(g.finishDate , INTERVAL 10 DAY)completeDate, g.recruitPeople, COUNT(g2.userId)joinNum, (SELECT COUNT(joinState) FROM groupbuyingjoining g3 WHERE g3.gbNo = g.gbNo AND joinState LIKE 'Y' ) completeCnt FROM groupbuyingpost g LEFT OUTER JOIN groupbuyingjoining g2 ON g.gbNo = g2.gbNo WHERE g.blockState LIKE 'N' AND g.gbState LIKE '진행' group by g.gbNo
